title: No More Monsters for Me!
description: Minn desperately wants a pet, Mom says no. But guess what's growing in the basement . . .Â a baby monster! Minneapolis Simpkin is hiding it down there. But a monster is a hard thing to keep secret, especially one that hiccups and cries, and gets bigger every hour. This Level One I Can Read is perfect for kids learning to sound out words and sentences. From the beloved creator of Amelia Bedelia, Peggy Parish, and illustrated by Caldecott medalist Marc Simont.
author: Peggy Parish
